analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.io.tgrep.TGrepWriter
analysisEngineMetaData.description: TGrep2 corpus file writer. Requires PennTrees to be annotated before.
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: targetLocation
configurationParameter.description: Path to which the output is written.

configurationParameter.name: writeComments
configurationParameter.description:
Set this parameter to true if you want to add a comment to each PennTree which is written to the output files. The comment is of the form documentId,beginOffset,endOffset.
Default: true

configurationParameter.name: writeT2c
configurationParameter.description:
Set this parameter to true if you want to encode directly into the tgrep2 binary format.
Default: true

configurationParameter.name: compression
configurationParameter.description:
Method to compress the tgrep file (only used if PARAM_WRITE_T2C is true). Only NONE, GZIP and BZIP2 are supported.
Default: CompressionMethod#NONE

configurationParameter.name: dropMalformedTrees
configurationParameter.description:
If true, silently drops malformed Penn Trees instead of throwing an exception.
Default: false
